name: Appu Kutta
greetingText: I really like your name btw!...... also your Butt ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
wishText: I double-checked the fine print on our Marriage Certificate, and it turns out you are legally required to be my Valentine for the next 50-60 years, However, being the gentleman that I am, I am giving you the illusion of free will. Will you be my Valentine? (Please say yes, I have absolutely no backup plan.)
